title: Lusanda
description: Lusanda is a fortified city in Que, probably in the eastern part of the Cilician plain. The city is mentioned with Abarnani and Kisuatni in royal inscriptions of the Assyrian king Shalmaneser III (r. 858-824 BC).

properties.description: Conjectured, proposed location of Lusanda according to the Helsinki Atlas. The coordinates are for the OSM Node Karahüyük (1417050719).
properties.title: Helsinki Atlas location of Lusanda
